item.title: I-80 West - Exit 34
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 34 - Fort Bridger. This is the western end of the Bridger Valley business loop.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 48
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 48 - BL-80/Lyman/Fort Bridger. This is the eastern end of the Bridger Valley business loop. BL-80 goes through Lyman and Fort Bridger.

item.title: I-80 West - Bridger Valley Historic Byway
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 48. Use Exit 48 for the Bridger Valley Historic Byway, a Wyoming scenic byway.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 48
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 48 - Bridger Valley. This is the east end of the Bridger Valley business loop.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 34
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 34 - Fort Bridger.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 48
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 48 - BL-80/Lyman/Fort Bridger. This is the eastern end of the Bridger Valley business loop. BL-80 goes through Lyman and Fort Bridger.

item.title: WY-414 South Approaching BL-80
item.description: WY-414 south approaching BL-80. Use BL-80 east for Lyman; BL-80 west for Fort Bridger State Historic Site. Continue south on WY-414 for Mountain View.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 34
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 34 - BL-80/Fort Bridger. This is the western end of the Bridger Valley business loop.

item.title: Bridger Valley Route Diagram
item.description: Route diagram for the Bridger Valley on I-80 east, descending into the Bridger Valley.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 34
item.description: I-80 East Approaching BL-80 to Fort Bridger
